name: Bad Buccaneers
description:
Bad Buccaneers

A series of fun-filled, pirate-themed multiplayer micro-games. Join a crew, bring your mateys, & see which one of yarr can get the most treasure!

Bad Buccaneers is a Local Co-op Microgame bundle that has fun challenges that include racing your boat down a treacherous river,  having "friendly" drink offs with your pals, fishing in shark infested water and of course... shooting yourself out of a cannon. 

With super simple controls for each game, anyone can pick this game up and enjoy it! So what are you waiting for scallywag, it's time to steal some treasARRRR!

CONTROLLER ONLY --- 2 TO 4 PLAYERS (NO SINGLEPLAYER)

Made by:

Rowan Koch

Thomas Lorenti

Mitchell Heath (TheOrignal201)

Jarrad Zuks

GameJolt Page: https://gamejolt.com/games/bad-buccaneers/630239

Supported controllers include:

 - Xbox 360 & Xbox One

- PlayStation DuelShock(4) & DuelSense(5)
